mapper.select: SELECT p.instrumentid, p.description, p.categoryid, p.holdings, p.price as price FROM SCOTT.cerebros_portfolio p WHERE p.clientId = #{clientId} ORDER BY p.holdings DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cerebros_portfolio (clientid, instrumentid,description, categoryId, holdings, price) VALUES (#{clientId}, #{portfolio.instrumentId},#{portfolio.description}, #{portfolio.categoryId}, #{portfolio.holdings}, #{portfolio.price})
